Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute at Cicero/Ohio
ShortDescription: 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Chicago, Laramie, Washington, and Cicero due to, street blockage near Cicero/Ohio.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Chicago, Laramie, Washington, and Cicero due to, street blockage near Cicero/Ohio.

Allow extra travel time.
